thread.title: J.K. Rowling Just Seriously Owned Piers Morgan in Most Epic Twitter Smack Down Ever
thread.title_full: J.K. Rowling Just Seriously Owned Piers Morgan in Most Epic Twitter Smack Down Ever

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: J.K. Rowling Just Seriously Owned Piers Morgan in Most Epic Twitter Smack Down Ever
text:
Today in Piers Morgan Getting Owned , we have a doozy filled with plenty of F-bombs—though that's to be expected, because it involves Jim Jefferies.
Last night's Real Time with Bill Maher was solidly insane in general, but the real gem was towards the end, when the Australian comedian absolutely ripped into Morgan for claiming President Donald Trump's executive order isn't a Muslim ban.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "There is no Muslim ban," Morgan said. "This is the hysteria I'm talking about; 85% of the world's Muslims are allowed in the country."
Right about there was when Jefferies lost it:
"Oh, fuck off. ...This is what you do, Piers. You say 'He hasn't done this, he hasn't done that, he's not going to do all these things.' Give him a fucking chance, mate. Hitler didn't kill the Jews on the first day. He worked up to it." Meanwhile, Morgan has been taking a leaf from Trump's book and tweeting madly about the whole thing:
He burned himself. I heard him apologise to producers after the show for losing his temper. https://t.co/PHhSGDDLGZ
— Piers Morgan (@piersmorgan) February 11, 2017 No. When they play the Hitler card vs Trump, there's no point. https://t.co/AuT7P9eFiC
— Piers Morgan (@piersmorgan) February 11, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Everything I said was factual.
If you think screaming 'FUCK OFF!!!' at me changes that, then you're mistaken. https://t.co/0U9fVoTjfc
— Piers Morgan (@piersmorgan) February 11, 2017 And then it got even better when Harry Potter author/LEGIT REGAL QUEEN J.K. Rowling jumped into the mix. First, she tweeted about how satisfying it was to see Morgan told to fuck off on live TV:
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Yes, watching Piers Morgan being told to fuck off on live TV is *exactly* as satisfying as I'd always imagined. https://t.co/4FII8sYmIt
— J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) February 11, 2017 Morgan reacted by saying Rowling's tweet was why he never read the Harry Potter books. Which was a big mistake, because she came for him yet again (and did not miss)
Because you had a premonition that one day the author would roar with laughter at seeing you called out for your bullshit on live TV? https://t.co/8rkKSqJTnG
— J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) February 11, 2017 And then Morgan couldn't resist responding again to tell Rowling that everything he said on the panel was factual, and that's when she really dragged him:
. @piersmorgan Would you like a couple of hours to mock up some pictures of refugees carrying explosives to substantiate your position? https://t.co/sFj0kqIajd
— J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) February 11, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The fact-free, amoral, bigotry-apologism of celebrity toady Piers Morgan is, of course, why it's so delicious to see him told to fuck off. https://t.co/4XNF4G0nlD
— J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) February 11, 2017 . @piersmorgan If only you'd read Harry Potter, you'd know the downside of sucking up to the biggest bully in school is getting burned alive.
— J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) February 11, 2017 #StillHurts pic.twitter.com/28rUHy2McC
— J.K. Rowling (@jk_rowling) February 11, 2017 Sorry, guy, but you've been outgunned. Time to pack up your toys and go home to Trump's dog house.
From: Esquire
